title: Sin Gaming is here and ready to deliver the spiciest OPL team AMA of the season.
body:
Hello eSports fans,

Welcome to our AMA and feel free to ask us ANYTHING. We will be hanging out in our gaming pad answering questions for an hour starting from 6pm.
All of our roster will be taking questions, which follows:

Top - Flaresz
Jungle - Juves
Mid - Ryoma
ADC - FBI
Support - Rogue

Additionally, our head coach Bencel and team owner Starjun will be lurking to answer any questions you might have for us.

You can find more info about our team at
Twitter.com/SinOceania
Facebook.com/SinOceania

replies.body:
@juves I'm ur biggest fan, how u doin bb? 

@starjun u used to call me on ur cellphone
Big Skwigs, Big Skwigs

> [{quoted}](name=RareWolf,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-03-03T07:00:56.357+0000)
>
> @juves I'm ur biggest fan, how u doin bb? 
> 
> @starjun u used to call me on ur cellphone

Hey thanks rarewolf,
We couldn't of done the boot camp in Brisbane without you!
Aw babe x ur welcom. Sin gaming till the end ❤️❤️

Juves: 1v1?
Rogue: Please teach me how to thresh, i have 200k mastery on him, i use the same mastery/runes as you. I want to learn more
Thinking about making a guide for him on YouTube sometime soon hopefully that helps you out, for now just remember, hook where they're going to be, not where they are!

> [{quoted}](name=Rogue1,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2017-03-03T09:22:45.769+0000)
>
> Thinking about making a guide for him on YouTube sometime soon hopefully that helps you out, for now just remember, hook where they're going to be, not where they are!

Link youtube channel, and i shall wait :)

Ok so the change from Wzrd to ry0ma - more or less fighto in the mid lane now?

To the team other than Juves - how is it living with the man, a constant laugh? Or draining? Cause from a viewers perspective, hes hilarious.

Keep up the good work guys, looking forward to seeing the new team lineup in action!

I guess Ill answer the wzrd to ry0ma question. We really felt like ry0ma suited our playstyle because we really like to be proactive around the map early and while Wzrd did make his name being the "river wzrd" we felt that ry0ma was much more aggressive. Not taking anything away from Wzrd though he is a great player in his own right and a even better person to be around, Im sure Wzrd will find success over at his new home.

At the start, Juves was a headache but you get used to it. He always brightens the mood and makes everyone laugh no matter what, and playing board games with him is always a big larf. I want to roast him more but I'm scared for my life so I'll stop before he mauls me.
It fun and entertaining living with Juves. We had random moments. For mid lane it going to be a secret.

probably more of an odd question, but is there any reason for your PC setups? I've only seen other houses with their rigs set up in lines against a wall, you guys have yours all around the same table.
There's not a wall long enough to fit all the computers sadly. That's the setup we wanted :(
fair enough, I thought it might be a team bonding thing
It sure is nice ganking my teammate and looking over the top of my monitor at them and smiling
don't forget you can play footsies ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Ask WZRD, that used to happen on the daily :^)

How did you guys find Flaresz?

Who would you guys say is the second most Alpha member of the household? (Not first, second)

> [{quoted}](name=RUSTYtheCASTER,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-03-03T07:17:55.452+0000)
>
> How did you guys find Flaresz?
> 
> Who would you guys say is the second most Alpha member of the household? (Not first, second)

Hey Rusty my mans,
I would say that Bencel is 2nd most Alpha, he knows the way of LIFE.
You've gotta be joking, you used to bully me until I hit you back and now you're scared LUL. I bench the most out of all of you
now!

I spent a lot of time contacting various international free agents for top lane and adc to give us a boost this split. I watched at least 10 solo queue games from each of the players I was looking at and spoke to them at length regarding their views on what is important and what they want to achieve if they play in a Wildcard region. Needless to say I asked a lot of people for help when I was looking for english speaking free agents in all regions and I was so elated with all the help I received from my peers that ended up with us getting Flaresz.

Juves.
When are you guy's going to have the PR meeting about Rouge's finger guns? It's affecting the high quality of the SIN organisation {{champion:17}}
My finger guns are the lifeblood of this here esports organisation, SIN would be NOTHING without it
Im going to finger gun rogues head.
Oh ye G'day m88888888888
I don't feel like i'm that jacked yet.

Who's your favourite Other manager? and why is it me? :) <3

What's your favourite FivetoEight Video?

Who is the cleanest out of all of you (Ranks please)

Who's the second best cook in the house?

I love the Pokemon one.
Christian > everyone else is a grub 
After me? Probably Benny

As much as you love tear cull? ;)
<3 See ya tomorrow!!

> [{quoted}](name=Manager,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-03-03T08:33:27.711+0000)
>
> As much as you love tear cull? ;)
> <3 See ya tomorrow!!

*War Flashbacks to Raid tear cull ezreal*

You then marco

The one of me

Uh Id say Me > Bencel > Flaresz > Vitkor > Rogue

Love ya <3
See you tomorrow!

@the entire squad.

So who's the best arm-wrestler?
Who is the best support in Oce and why is it likearouge?

That guy Jason ( the non grand one ) made y'all a few videos here and there that were a pretty unique style.

What do you guys think you're aiming for in a media sense?

Also, which SIN boy wants a video made next? ;)
@Rogue1 since mr cuddles is at home, is there a pet in place for the gaming house. if not can i fill that role? <3
@FBI how do I look as sexy as you my boy

when I die will Rogue look after my cats?

Does Juves' mom still want to sign my tits?
I cannot answer for my mum, apologies.

Well, do you still want to sign my tits?

I have a couple of unsigned tits here and quite frankly, thats sad.

> [{quoted}](name=Ivy Valentine,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2017-03-03T08:05:31.659+0000)
>
> when I die will Rogue look after my cats?
> 
> Does Juves' mom still want to sign my tits?

My Mum is the crazy cat lady who feeds and adopts all the local strays, I'm sure she'll give you cats a place to call home :^)
I believe I asked you specifically Rogue. I WANT MY CATS TO HAVE A STRONG MALE INFLUENCE IN THEIR LIFE. But not Juves. A good influence.
Ryoma: How are you feeling going into your first OPL game with Sin? What do you think you bring to the team?
I'm feeling confident and nervous but mostly confident. I feel like i bring a carry threat to the team which is what i feel like they needed.
Awesome, good luck!
Who is the true alpha male in the SIN Gaming organisation?

> [{quoted}](name=Middle Runner,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=Ef2ZoJc3,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2017-03-03T07:40:45.812+0000)
>
> Who is the true alpha male in the SIN Gaming organisation?

I can out bench all these fools, me uncontested

Bencel: how do you put up with all these guys?

Rogue: if you could bring your cat to the house, would you?

Starjun: what is the most creative thing you've done to get the Sin gaming house up and running?
